title: Gorgeous 4 BDR / 3 BATH SFH - Bright Corner Lot Gem @RentalsInSF.com
posting_body: 799 29th Avenue is located in the Richmond district, located in a quiet and safe neighborhood.
Please view the home in person before applying.
A rare find and a spectacular home with beautiful coved ceilings and arched doorways.
Every room is flooded with bright, natural light.

Walk into a large foyer with coat closet, spacious living room with Batchelder tiled fireplace and east facing windows, formal dining room, large eat-in kitchen with stainless appliances: Viking stove, Bosch dishwasher and fridge.
An instant hot water dispenser at the sink is ideal for hot beverages.
Bright breakfast nook towards the rear of the kitchen.

The main level includes several closets in the hallway, a full bath, split bath and two large bedrooms overlooking a garden with trumpet flowers, a sweet plum tree, and various other self maintaining bushes.
The top level is an amazing light filled master bedroom with ensuite full bath, two closets and access to the rooftop.
The fourth bedroom is a separate unit, which CAN NOT be subleased, but perfect for guest quarters, an au pair, office, maid’s quarters or entertainment room.
A full bath, kitchen, ample closet space, and french doors dividing the living room and bedroom completes this unique space.
Large 2 car tandem garage with washer and dryer and good storage space.
A workbench is included for DYI projects.
- 1 split bath: separate tub and shower stall and sink in one room; toilet and sink in separate room
- Spacious living room w/ built it shelving and decorative fireplace
- Large kitchen with breakfast nook and stainless steel appliances: Viking stove, Bosche dishwasher, refrigerator
- Full bath with shower stall (no tub)
- Lots of natural light and peekaboo views of the Pacific Ocean
SEPARATE GARDEN LEVEL GUEST QUARTERS/ HOME OFFICE:
- Open living space + kitchen; appliances include stove, refrigerator, heater and microwave oven
- Private entrance through garden (no access from the main house)
- Security Deposit: 1.5x rent + $500 non refundable cleaning deposit
- Utilities: Tenant pays all - water, garbage and PG&E
- Pet negotiable: Small dog or cat under 25lbs; reviewed on a case by case basis
Broker - Rentals In SF 1318 Hayes Street San Francisco CA 94117
